title: How to integrate a payment gateway for my tech support business - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, You may want to explore PayU. PayU provides easy to integrate APIs. You can integrate PayU payment gateway on your website in minutes. The onboarding process is 100% online and hassle-fee. All you need to do is upload some documents from your end regarding your business and your address & bank verification, etc. and you can start accepting payments in no time. For more details, visit PayU’s official site. Hope this helps!!
